item.title: PSA: Keep your computer clean!
item.description: That much dust came off the radiator. The dust was heavily reducing the cooling of the cpu. I can’t stress this enough. Cooling systems full with dust reducing the cooling throughput your computer. What do the Pictures “tell” you? The air flow isn’t going through very well. If your computer is under high load, it could happen that the cpu or gpu are throttled. because of high temperature. In worst case: When it’s getting really hot, one of your computer components may overheat and causes your computer to get slower or just turn off.
